thread.title: Travel Agent Academy Launches ACE Rewards Platform
thread.title_full: Travel Agent Academy Launches ACE Rewards Platform

title: Travel Agent Academy Launches ACE Rewards Platform
text:
Last updated: 02:08 PM ET, Thu August 06 2015 Travel Agent Academy Launches ACE Rewards Platform Travel Agent | Courtney Love | August 06, 2015 
Travel Agent Academy, in conjunction with Aruba Tourism Authority is excited to announce that the Aruba Certified Expert reporting page is up and running. This page is a one stop site for Aruba Certified Experts to report their booking for the chance to win cash rewards! Simply visit rewards.arubacertifiedexpert.com and enter in all of your 2015 Aruba bookings. 
Report these bookings no later than Sept. 30 and Aruba will go back and determine the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd place winners of VISA gift cards as ACE rewards for the first two quarters of 2015 – you’ve already booked these trips for your clients, why not report them to win some extra cash for yourself? < Do you want to read the full story? You must be a registered travel professional with an active account to view the full story. Are you a Travel Agent? Log in to your account now, or register for free!
